titles.title: A resolution to authorize the conditional release of records by the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide to the Board of Contract Appeals of the General Services Administration records of the Committee's investigation of the Electronic Tandem Network telecommunications procurement.
